Core:PCProperties.Core:Property: "Shows if that character is online or offline, their idle time if they are online, and when that character last connected and disconnected. It also shows the average time spent online per connect."

"+lastseen Roane\\r\\nStoryCoder Roane is online and idle for 0h 0m 00s. She last connected at 9:49 PM, September 13th, 2004, last disconnected at 5:23 PM, September 8th, 2004 and spends an average of 11h 39m 59s online per connect.\\r\\n"
